summary: Ik omschrijf mezelf als een duizendpoot die uiteenlopende projecten aanpakt en ze tot het einde toe in goede banen leidt. Dit doe ik graag i.s.m. anderen. Ik ben een verbinder, leg snel verbanden tussen personen, ideeën en mogelijkheden. In mijn werk, maar ook daarbuiten wil ik mezelf en anderen verwonderen, enthousiasmeren, laten participeren en in sommige gevallen confronteren.

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Arts, cum laude - 1st degree

projects.title: Educational books for the Van Abbemuseum
projects.description:
A lot of families come to the museum to do something together. I developed a little book called 'Het DoeBoek & De DoeTas' that can guide you through the exhibitions. The main goal is that the visitor has a nice day, or at least a good time in the museum. activity is specifically made for families with children aged 6 to 12 years.

Collaboration is the keyword. All assignments are designed to ensure that the whole family does things together. They complete each other in story, add something to the work or look trough a piece of plastic so they can see something different and so on.

The book forms a “spatial viewing guide” that can be taken separately by visitors, but can also be used with tour guides in the museum.
The book uses artworks from the collection to look at the current exhibition.
From the permanent collection of the museum, I looked at various works that are displayed in various exhibitions. These various works of art may not be visible in the museum at the time of the visit. 

Because of the combination of several learning theories, teaching methods and intelligences, which constitute a different viewpoint, the (art)object as shown in the exhibition is explained.

As a sequel to 'Het DoeBoek & De DoeTas' I developed a new activity book called ' De Globetrotter Express'. The book is specially made for the exhibition 'Lissitzky-Kabakov Utopia and Reality' that will take place in the van Abbemuseum from 1 December 2012 to 28 April 2013.

During this exhibition this book can be used by visitors. From januari 2013 untill April 2013 there was an additional guided tour available with a real actor playing the main character in the book.
'The Announcer' is taking the visitor into the world of Lissitzky and Kabakov and ensure a memorable visit.

projects.title: Shaping Senses
projects.description:
Shaping Senses
Traditionally labor-intensive craftsmanship in spatial visual work
Curators Floortje de Boer and Christianne Niesten

Content:
The exhibition 'Shaping Senses' pays attention to a new trend in contemporary art: the return of the traditional craftsmanship, specifically in spatial visual work. The focus is put on the reflective, creative process of labor-intensive techniques.

Curators Christianne Niesten and Floortje de Boer made a very good concept. The exhibition concept is in line with current findings in the field of culture and art, and was inspired by a book of Richard Sennett, The Craftsman. The participating artists have been selected because of their search for specific skills that have put their imaginations in motion, and their ability to appeal to the different senses of the viewer.

ABK members: Wim Bakker, Ike Cleeff, Ank van Engelen, Jan Paul Hulsenbek, Claus-Pierre Leinenbach, Deirdre McLoughlin, Martina Otto, Old Simon, Janine Schimkat
Guest Exhibitors: Natasha Alers, Kees Boeve, Tommy van der Loo, Sven Fritz, Jonathan Gaarthuis, Menno Hiele, Sil Krol, Pablo Ponce, Lorenzo Quintanilla.

In anticipation of Brabant City, Capital of Culture 2018, this exhibition fits the profile of this province as the cultural center of industry and handicraft technique. The Prince Bernhard Culture and the Municipality of North Brabant Den Bosch make a financial contribution.

contributors.headline: Senior Lecturer Cultural Studies at Master of Education in Arts - Fontys

projects.title: Theatre of Changzhou
projects.description:
'China - een reis door de geschiedenis'

Tilburg en Changzhou, een stad in Nederland en een stad in China. Ogenschijnlijk hebben ze niks met elkaar te maken, maar niets is minder waar. Tilburg en Changzhou hebben een band met elkaar, al vijftien jaar lang. Wat ooit begon als een economisch uitwisselingsplan, groeit uit tot een intensieve verhouding, ook op cultureel en educatief vlak.

Theatre of Changzhou: zakenleven, politiek en kunst komen samen
Dit alles is een opmaat naar een culturele manifestatie in laatste twee weken van april 2013. Theater De NWE Vorst veranderde in Theatre of Changzhou. Al het in China verzamelde werk wordt tussen november en april uitgewerkt tot toneel, dans, beeldende kunst, debatten en educatieve projecten. Ook is er een ongewone tijdsbalk te zien, ontworpen en gemaakt door Floortje de Boer, waarop de geschiedenis van China wordt uitgewerkt. Bij gebrek aan ruimte en overvloed aan transparante wanden ontwierp zij deze tijdlijn die haar en de geschiedenis meer ruimte bood en die de toeschouwer uitnodigde te dwalen door de geschiedenis van China.

Tijdens dit tiendaagse culturele programma smelten zakenleven, politiek en kunst samen. Theatre of Changzhou wordt een ontmoeting en een feest voor studenten, theaterbezoekers, het bedrijfsleven en China-liefhebbers.
Met deze culturele manifestatie slaan Theater De NWE Vorst, Fontys Hogescholen en Het Zuidelijk Toneel  een brug tussen de twee verschillende landen en culturen, tussen onderwijs, kunst, politiek en het bedrijfsleven.

projects.title: Body Turn
projects.description: Body Turn is a public interactive artwork which was exhibited in the Amphia Hospital, Breda. The installation was situated in the revolving door of the entrance. It registered the amount of people entering the hospital and made drawings of this information.

profile_positions.description: Holy Motion is specialized in stop-motion animation and is based in Arnhem, the Netherlands. Holy Motion aims to make high quality stop-motion productions films for both Dutch and international audiences. With its own fully equiped workshop, studio and kitchen, Holy Motion Studio has all the facilities and expertise to create state of the art sets, props, animations and happy freelancers. We can produce and build almost anything!

profile_positions.title: Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Head of Production for the 'Studium Generale'-event with 1600 participants and 25 different workshops, lectures and field researches. 

In 2017 and 2018 Avans University of Applied Sciences organized the 'Studium Generale'. During this event students, together with artists, designers and teachers, examined how the context of an academy presents both limitations and opportunities to give meaning to the world outside the academy walls. In interdisciplinary groups field researches were done and professionals showed how they work.
profile_positions.title: Productionmanager

company.name: PLAYGROUNDS festival for Animation and Digital Arts

profile_positions.company: PLAYGROUNDS festival for Animation and Digital Arts
profile_positions.description:
Producer for Playgroundfestival

PLAYGROUNDS
A SHOWCASE AND CELEBRATION OF THE CREATIVE IMAGE. FOR THOSE WHO ARE CURIOUS, BRAVE AND STEP OUT OF THE BOX.
Presenting the best and brightest of contemporary animators, vfx artists, game developers, sound & graphic designers in a year round program. Conferences, Sessions, Expo's and an online Platform: we bring together innovative artists and creative professionals in workshops, performances, screenings, artist talks and our online community. Please be invited to meet extraordinary filmmakers and audio visual artists!
 
Playgrounds is an innovator and connector between maker, industry, education and audience, providing a stable fundament to boost new and relevant developments in the moving image (animation, visual effects, digital arts).
profile_positions.title: Producer

profile_positions.description:
Coordinating the development of an on-site art app that allows people to be immersed by the collection of the Van Abbemuseum and Radboudumc Nijmegen. 

This project is part of the Special Guests program of the Van Abbemuseum.
In hospitals patients and visitors spend a lot of time waiting in the different residence areas. Enough time to use the Van Abbe-app on the smartphone to take a dip in the collection.

Along with the museum and the participating hospitals, I delved into the needs and the art experience of patients and carers. The development of the final product has been done in collaboration with INTK, an expert in developing online applications and strategies.
profile_positions.title: Projectcoordinator - Special Guests Program

profile_positions.description:
In ARTSWAP three artists from Brabant in the Netherlands swap with three artists from Finnisch Lapland to explore three different environment; the natural, social, and economical environment.
I curated the exhibition and I was projectmanager for this project. The exhibition 'Angle of Incidence' took place in the Willem II Fabriek in 's-Hertogenbosch and was realy well visited with many enthusiastic reactions.
profile_positions.title: Curator and artmanager for ArtSwap - Angle of Incidence
